summary: Spell for convert stamina into magicka.
descriptionHtml:
If you frustaded by run out magicka in early and mid levels or simply because stamina is useless for your pure mage character, then this mod is for you.

A very simple spell to convert stamina into magicka, but if used when stamina is depleted then it paralyses the caster for a moment. The spell tome can be found at the Riverwood trader, Tolfdir from whiterun, and at any court mage.

I don\'t care who does what with this mod. I created to make early mages job easier and put the stamina into good use for mages.

bug:
When you get up from paralyze your hands stay like you still casting and you must change your spell or recast for a moment to fix it.
author: Kombinator
